thread.title: U.S. Launches Fast-Track Process for Rules on Drones
thread.title_full: U.S. Launches Fast-Track Process for Rules on Drones - WSJ

author: Jack Nicas
title: U.S. Launches Fast-Track Process for Rules on Drones
text:
U.S. Transportation Secretary Anthony Foxx launched an unusual fast-track rule-making process to start requiring drone owners to register their devices before Christmas, a rare move in aviation regulation. He said new rules are necessary because drones are endangering manned aircraft.
Mr. Foxx said Monday he is ordering a task force of 25 to 30 industry and government representatives to recommend the specifics of a drone-registration...
